commands: version=$(grep '^version:' charts/{{{parentDir}}}/Chart.yaml | awk '{print $2}') && major=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f1) && minor=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f2) && patch=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f3) && minor=$(expr $minor + 1) && echo "Replacing $version with $major.$minor.$patch" && sed -i "s/^version:.*/version: ${major}.${minor}.${patch}/g" charts/{{{parentDir}}}/Chart.yaml && sed -i "s/^appVersion:.*/appVersion: \"{{newVersion}}\"/g" charts/{{{parentDir}}}/Chart.yaml && cat charts/{{{parentDir}}}/Chart.yaml
